headline: TLS 1.3 is going to save us all, and why IoT is still insecure
keywords: IoT, TLS 1.3, TLS, Security, Gatebot, DDoS, Cryptography
description: As I’m writing this, four DDoS attacks are ongoing and being automatically mitigated by Gatebot. Cloudflare’s job is to get attacked. Our network gets attacked constantly.
